Module contents¶

Crons code

Available classes/functions for running crons

crons.emailError(subject, error, recipient=None)¶

Email Error

Send out an email with an error message

Parameters

  • subject (str) – The subject of the email

  • error (str) – The error to email

  • recipient (str|str[]) – The recipient of the email

Returns

bool

crons.isRunning(name)¶

Is Running

Checks if the cron job is already running, if not, creates pidfile so future calls return true

Parameters

{str} -- The name of the cron job to check (name) –

Returns

bool
